cat.lump.lucene

Class Xecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • cat.lump.lucene.Xecutor

  • public class Xecutor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class intends to join together all the necessary process to extract the articles related to a given category through the Lucene engine. It covers from the indexing of the Wikipedia articles up to the storage of the relevant articles.
    Since:
    Feb 7, 2016
    Author:
    cristina

      Obtains the vocabulary that represents the given category in the language and year Wikipedia.
      void indexEdition(java.lang.String inputDir, java.lang.String indexDir)
      Indexes the Wikipedia edition in language "locale" available at inputDir, and outputs the indexes at indexDir.
